Comments_List: Some chip testing algorithms for synchronous circuits and asynchronous circuits.
Next year, this course can be offered in fall semester. In this way, we will have 1 year to wait for chips.
This is a very good course for students who are interested in VLSI. I will highly recommend this course to these students.
Yes I will, because we went through the main method to test a chip nowadays, it is an important step to build a working chip
